works.description: Smith of Derby has been creating many of the world’s most iconic public timepieces for over 150 years. Now, the British firm has created the world’s first luxury Muslim Prayer clock to celebrate the Islamic faith. To be unveiled at the Interiors Show in Abu Dhabi today, the Smith of Derby’s Islamic clock comes with a gold leaf finish, and costs AED 121,000 (£20,000, $33,000). The luxury prayer clock is targeted at prestigious interiors, such as mosques and hotel receptions, as well as homes.
